\begin{table}[t]
\centering
\caption{Long-context stability comparison. ResNet-BK maintains stable training up to 1M tokens while Mamba diverges at 32k.}
\label{tab:longcontext}
\begin{tabular}{lcccc}

\midrule
8k   & 27.8 $\pm$ 2.2 & \textbf{NaN} & \checkmark & \texttimes \\
32k   & 26.2 $\pm$ 1.7 & \textbf{NaN} & \checkmark & \texttimes \\
128k   & 88.6 $\pm$ 63.5 & \textbf{NaN} & \checkmark & \texttimes \\
512k   & 26.0 $\pm$ 1.3 & \textbf{NaN} & \checkmark & \texttimes \\
1M   & 30.6 $\pm$ 1.0 & \textbf{NaN} & \checkmark & \texttimes \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}
\end{table}
